comments.body: did not add tests for `_resolve_registry_uri` as it's fairly well-covered by the client tests
Just added an explanatory comment for cases where we do want to use `notrackingurimock`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@from mlflow.tracking._tracking_service.utils import _TRACKING_URI_ENV_VAR

# Disable mocking tracking URI here, as we want to test setting the tracking URI via
# environment variable. See
# http://doc.pytest.org/en/latest/skipping.html#skip-all-test-functions-of-a-class-or-module
